question: Can we eat or Drink some thing after intercourse with out GUSAL? and is it compulsary to make wudhu before intercourse?
answer:
QUESTION
Can we eat or Drink some thing after intercourse with out GUSAL? and is it compulsary to make wudhu before intercourse?
ANSWER


Share:
It is not compulsory to make Ghusl in order to eat or drink after intercourse. However, it is preferable to wash the hands and rinse the mouth before doing so. (Shaami vol.1 pg.175; HM Saeed)

It is not compulsory to make Wudhu before.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
